text:
@BarackObama DO NOT EAT ANIMALS: 
Eating animals make sick: coronavirus, cancer
Animals are living creatures not food

FORBID TRANSPORTING ANIMALS
FORBID CRUELTY TO ANIMALS

God sees everything

DO NOT KILL ANIMALS !

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks
